channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- Container Runtime
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- Container Runtime

item.title: CVE-2018-1223|2024-08-05T03:51:49.007Z -- cloud%20foundry -- container%20runtime
item.description: Cloud Foundry Container Runtime (kubo-release), versions prior to 0.14.0, may leak UAA and vCenter credentials to application logs. A malicious user with the ability to read the application logs could use these credentials to escalate privileges.
